info.author: Maurizio Lupo
info.description:
Redomino Flowsearch
===================

Redomino Flowsearch is a new plugin for Plone CMS that provides an advanced search view optimized for Plone 
accoding to its features, replacing Plone's default search tool.

Thanks to its tab-divided layout, it's much easier to set your search parameters compared to common, 
long 'Advanced search' pages.
In Redomino Flowsearch the search activity is contextual, that is it always considers and notifies which is your 
current position in the website, therefore the position you're searching in.
Furthermore, redomino.flowsearch features search parameters that have been capitalized according on Plone's 
characteristics and provided information. Search parameters are:

    - Search text
    - Path
    - Content types
    - Date range
    - Review state
    - Contributors
    - Sort results by...

Screenshot:

.. figure:: https://github.com/redomino/redomino.flowsearch/raw/master/docs/resources/flowsearch.png 
   :align:   center

   Flowsearch view

Real-time update of search results: for every change you apply to the parameters, search results are 'live', meaning
they are updated in real time; which means no more results page being refreshed or another page being opened. 

Changelog
=========

0.13 (2012-11-12)
-----------------

- fix search context for IE [sithmel]


0.12 (2012-10-24)
-----------------

- From now, when you change the search context it changes the search path
  accordingly [sithmel]
- removed dependency from plone "search_form.pt" (removed in Plone 4.2)
  [sithmel]

0.11 (2012-09-19)
-----------------

- fix css [giacomos]
- omitting current container from the search results the program crashes because
  the plone portal has no IUUID adapter [giacomos, sithmel]


0.10 (2012-07-19)
-----------------

- Added separated search view for a better results management
  [giacomos]


0.9 (2012-07-18)
----------------

- Fixed error on filtering by last access date
  [giacomos]


0.8 (2012-07-17)
----------------

- Fix templates: now it validates with xhtml strict w3c validator
  [sithmel]

- Added .gitignore file
  [davidemoro]

- Fixed README.txt
  [davidemoro]


0.7 (2012-06-29)
----------------

- Updated README.txt.
  [dmoro]


0.6 (2012-06-22)
----------------

- added flowsearch as a folder and site view [sithmel]


0.5 (2012-06-07)
----------------

- fix Search criteria's bg color [sithmel]
- limit batching to 10 elements [sithmel]
- added a message on ajax errors [sithmel]


0.4 (2012-06-05)
----------------

- fix js markup [sithmel]


0.3 (2012-05-23)
----------------

- Initial release

info.summary: Redomino Flowsearch is a new plugin for Plone CMS that provides an advanced search view
info.html_description:
Redomino Flowsearch

Redomino Flowsearch is a new plugin for Plone CMS that provides an advanced search view optimized for Plone accoding to its features, replacing Plone’s default search tool.

Thanks to its tab-divided layout, it’s much easier to set your search parameters compared to common, long ‘Advanced search’ pages. In Redomino Flowsearch the search activity is contextual, that is it always considers and notifies which is your current position in the website, therefore the position you’re searching in. Furthermore, redomino.flowsearch features search parameters that have been capitalized according on Plone’s characteristics and provided information. Search parameters are:

  • Search text
  • Path
  • Content types
  • Date range
  • Review state
  • Contributors
  • Sort results by…

Screenshot:

Flowsearch view

Real-time update of search results: for every change you apply to the parameters, search results are ‘live’, meaning they are updated in real time; which means no more results page being refreshed or another page being opened.

Changelog

0.13 (2012-11-12)

  • fix search context for IE [sithmel]

0.12 (2012-10-24)

  • From now, when you change the search context it changes the search path accordingly [sithmel]
  • removed dependency from plone “search_form.pt” (removed in Plone 4.2) [sithmel]

0.11 (2012-09-19)

  • fix css [giacomos]
  • omitting current container from the search results the program crashes because the plone portal has no IUUID adapter [giacomos, sithmel]

0.10 (2012-07-19)

  • Added separated search view for a better results management [giacomos]

0.9 (2012-07-18)

  • Fixed error on filtering by last access date [giacomos]

0.8 (2012-07-17)

  • Fix templates: now it validates with xhtml strict w3c validator [sithmel]
  • Added .gitignore file [davidemoro]

0.6 (2012-06-22)

0.5 (2012-06-07)

0.3 (2012-05-23)
